channel.title: >>>>Need Help Anyone (Prayer)<<<<
channel.description:
Yeah, like 90% in me server are using Prayer that makes that i can't se the text, and if they get 0/0 in prayer they can't wear anything
Can any1 plz help me with that ?... Like how i can add a prayer altar Witch recharge their prayer and make that it wont get the text to disapear..
Thanks ...
Or if there is any tutorial Please by nice and post the link here :D

item.title: >>>>Need Help Anyone (Prayer)<<<<
item.dc:creator: @Chemical_Reaction Chemical Reaction
item.description:
@Chemical_Reaction wrote:

Add this if you have training on objects or anything that uses objects to get xp or do something search up something from that code and add this:

         case 61:
    setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]);
    playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
    refreshSkills();
    setAnimation(645);
    sendMessage("You recharge your prayer");
    updateRequired = true;
    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;

replace Case: 61 with your altar code or whatver you want to recharge your pray, so if its like a range target it would be Case: 162
or whatever range target is

Read full topic
